summary: Going for a colorful realistic look, The hobbit has been one of my lighting references for this ENB.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/y39fz45.jpg[/img]

Who am I and what do I do?

My name is Ronnie Ree. I call my self Kalicola on the web (sometimes). I am 35 years old and work as a character animator in Denmark, and have just finished my work on Hitman Absolution.

Mod Discription:

This is my ENB config, that I have been working one since the day the ENB mod was released. The goal is to make a more apealing skyrim, with better colors, brighter light, darker shadows, better contrast, better shadows, intense fire and magic effects, scary dungeons, movie style depth of field, and in general make a very balanced ENB that is optimal for a playthrough.

My aim for the look is more "The Hobbit" and less "Lord of the rings" Meaning, brighter lights and colors and less gray and flat, with a little bit of Michael Bay in there too :)

[b][size=4]Here is the trailer[/size][/b]
[youtube]DpowqcIlsog[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fOuFEin.jpg[/img]

Very Important:

Enable this in SkyrimPrefs.ini:

bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1

[img]http://i.imgur.com/zdw0UgG.jpg[/img]

Compatability:

Disable all mods that changes the lighting of the world, like realistic lighting, URWL, climates of tamriel and mods like that. This enb does not work with those mods: Mods that changes sunlight and shadows does NOT work with this, well, i does, but it wont be looking like in the video og screenshots.
Mod that fixes point lights (lanterns, fire bowls, candle lights) around the world should be fine to use, but they might become brighter or darker, so keep that in mind when installing those other mods, I use Claralux myself, so that one works fine.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ndACVzG.jpg[/img]

How to install:

This Enb is optimised using the ENB binary version 0.279, and if you can't find that one (Boris sometimes removes them again) then just download next number in the series, and it should work just fine.

1. Download the v0.279 from here: http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm

2. Copy the d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe file to your skyrim folder (SteamApps\common\Skyrim). Don't copy the other files over, only d3d9.dll

3. Download my files and copy them over to the same skyrim folder

That's it.

To uninstall just delete all those files again

Mod manager does not work for installing this

[img]http://i.imgur.com/WNbuKdx.jpg[/img]

Notes about the ENB

This ENB has reflections turned OFF, cause I don't think the quality of the reflections is good enough yet.

The depth of field is blurring the character in character creation, so use Shift-F12 to turn ENB OFF when creating your character.

I have also disabled the sun lens flare, cause I don't like the look of it.

This ENB does not have Anti Aliasing in it.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/cvcM6Jm.jpg[/img]

[b]These two mods below is kind of important to make the rainy days look awesome. The rain in this ENB is tweaked with these mods installed. You don't have to use it of course. If you don't use it, the rain effects are VERY subtle, so keep that in mind.[/b]

1. True Storms - Thunder and Rain Redone - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478/? (This for thunder and more snow)

2. RAIN- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54085/? (This on top for different rain in all 3 rain weather modes, I use "RAIN v3 x256 grayscale")

Other Graphic mods that I use in the screenshots and video, in order of install (These mods are not requred, but will make the game look alot better)

1. Pure Waters - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?

2. Vivid Landscapes - All in One - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/?

3. aMidianBorn Landscape - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37865/?

4. Skyrim Better Roads (SkyBeRoads) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57612/?

5. Skyrim Flora Overhaul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?

6. Mountains Rocks - This mod is gone, but you can of course just use whatever Rock texture you want :-) 
This rock mod is also awesome! http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5504/?

7. Skyrim Ultra HD Texture Pack - This mod is alo gone. It give a better texture to alot of objects and creatures in the game

8. Skyrim Particle Patch for ENB-All-In-One - http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499

9. Unbelievable Grass Two - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67478/?

10. Skyrim Landscape Overhaul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53632/?

11. WSCO - Windsong Skyrim Character Overhaul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52322/?

12. No Radial blur - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17499/?

13. FAR - Forgotten Argonian Roots - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42043/?

14. Coverkhajiits- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5941/?

15. Hold Border Banners - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43493/?

16. Illustrated Panels Towns V1o5 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23886/?

17. EotW Mage Equipment Overhaul - College Mage Robes - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49110/?

18. Hale - Horse Retexture - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39128/?

19. Draugr Nasty Retexture - no glowing eyes UPDATE - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22836/?

20. More Bony Skeletons and HD skeleton clutter - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11219/?

21. More Dramatic Alduin Retexture - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54070/?

22. Real Roads for Skyrim - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55518/?

23. Fairies of Skyrim - Can't find that one again

24. Real Snow - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29036/?

25. SPRAY - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64648/?

26. CLARALUX - More and Brighter Lights  - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17605/?

27. The WatchTowers - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22055/?

28. Sincar Barrens- A resting place mod - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21090/?

29. Legendary Cities - Tes Arena - Skyrim Frontier Fortress - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47989/?

30. UltraHD - Stormcloak and City Guards  - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42404/?

31. aMidianBorn Book of Silence - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?

32. fxsnowflakesblur fix - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6906/?

[img]http://i.imgur.com/tVtif5X.jpg[/img]

Here's a link to my other mod I did:

Kalicolas Live Action Intro HD
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24618

Credits:

- Boris Vorontsov, autor of ENBseries
- And basicaly all the guys at the enb.dev forum for inspiration and helping me out when I ran into problems.

Support:

I won't be able to support this mod much, I'm not getting any mail or anything whenever someone writes a comment in here. So it's difficult for me to know when new comments are posted. So please be patience if I don't reply right away. You can comment on the youtube trailer, where I see it instantly, and I AM very interested to know what you all think of this ENB, and if it have any problems. Thanks all :-) 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/XE5Elap.jpg[/img]
author: Kalicola
